Resistance availed him not, and his very
freedom to move was robbed by black mana.
But then it tried to worm its way into his very
mind, grasping to possess him and extend
its influence most foul.

That emptiness was darker than the depths of
the most light-starved sea, and it crushed and
clawed at Poseidon's consciousness, becoming
a nightmare from which there was no waking.

<ruby><rb>光届</rb><rt>ひかりとど</rt></ruby>かぬ<ruby><rb>深海</rb><rt>しんかい</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>底</rb><rt>そこ</rt></ruby>よりもなお<ruby><rb>色濃</rb><rt>いろこ</rt></ruby>い、

那遠比光線無法觸及的深海

context.en_us:
Yet the sea king demonstrated his willpower,
refusing to yield his last haven and ever
resisting the encroaching oblivion of black
mana upon his mind.

context.zh_cn: 然而，波塞冬展现了大海之王的骨气，\n为了不能让内心被夺走，\n拼命地抵抗着“黑暗魔力”。

然而，
波塞頓展現了身為大海王者的氣魄，

context.en_us:
Much time passed—though how much, the
dragon did not know. But one day, the darkness
before him began to squirm and shift and
undulate curiously, taking on shape.

Poseidon, whose bearded mouth cracked into
speech. ＂You are weak,＂ he said. ＂Old and
withered. You are no king of the sea.＂

お<ruby><rb>前</rb><rt>まえ</rt></ruby>は<ruby><rb>大海</rb><rt>たいかい</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>王</rb><rt>おう</rt></ruby>などではない」

最终，它变成了黑色的波塞冬——
波塞冬·虚空之影。
它长着胡须的嘴角一勾，开口说道：
“你太弱，已经年老体衰了。

不久。那股黑暗化為

Seeking to make his heart waver, the black
mana lobbed poisonous words to break the
other's confidence. But Poseidon saw plain his
intentions and responded with merry laughter.

context.en_us:
＂Spare me your assays! Stay your jests!
I am stronger than any, and though my body
may be old, I remain, as ever, the vigorous
